Articles.Content:
Synergy is a program that lets you control two computers from a single keyboard/mouse by sliding the mouse cursor off of the screen and onto the next screen.

In the 0.25 KSP 32bit, this all worked fine. In 0.90 KSP 32bit, the mouse now gets stuck at the side of the screen and will not move to the other PC's screen.

Hmm, interesting. Are you playing KSP on the server or the client? I play KSP on my synergy server in windowed mode and it works flawlessly.

No doubt this is due to the Unity 4.5.5 upgrade, failing any quickfixes that may be possible, we'll have to hope this one is in the next Unity patch (if not 4.6.x).
